summary: Provides a comprehensive set of unit tests for the dimensionless plasma‑collision utilities, checking that the Knudsen number and coupling‑parameter functions handle invalid inputs, support NumPy arrays, reproduce reference values, respect symmetry, emit appropriate warnings, and correctly compute quantum‑related and mean‑value cases.
business_intent: Ensures the reliability and scientific accuracy of the plasma‑physics library by automatically validating core collision‑related calculations, preventing regressions, and guaranteeing proper error and warning behavior for downstream users.
